original_text: It was a Jewish day of rest when Jesus had done this miracle. He had used mud to make the man's eyes able to see.
korean_text: 예수께서 진흙을 이겨 눈을 뜨게 하신 날은 안식일이라

sentences.original_text: It was a Jewish day of rest
when Jesus had done this miracle
to make the man's eyes able to see
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람의 눈이 보이게 하기 위해
